docs.snippet: Economic sentiment in the 19-countries sharing the euro slipped for the third month in a row in March, data from the European Commission showed on Tuesday, suggesting economic growth in the bloc was not as steady as previously thought.

headline.print_headline: Euro Zone Sentiment Falls in March, Casting Doubt on Growth Outlook
